about_the_game:
Hello! Hei! Halló! Hej! Hallå! Hallo!

It’s time to set off on a brand-new adventure with the Ticket to Ride Nordic Expansion! Ride across the northern reaches, connect colourful cities, and complete tickets from the top of Iceland to the southern border of Denmark! 

Chase the Globetrotter bonus, awarded to the player with the most completed tickets. Strategise with 40 train pieces instead of 45 to make connecting the Nordic cities more challenging, and tackle the Murmansk-Lieksa route, a new nine-train-long route! Plus, you can swap three coloured railway car cards for one locomotive card. 

Includes:

  • TWO NEW CHARACTERS – Play as Mina Larsen, a cheerful reindeer herder who is wrapped up warm in preparation for the snowy northern lands, and Morten Jensen, an elegant author with bold ambitions to collect as many Nordic folklore stories as train tickets!

  • TWO NEW TRAINS – The charming Arctic Express and the titanic Frosthammer locomotives!

  • TWO NEW CARRIAGES – The Snowdrifter keeps its passengers warm and snug as they travel from city to city. To reach new heights, pick the towering Hearthside double-decker carriage! 

Take on new horizons with the Nordic Expansion!

package_groups.title: Buy Ticket to Ride® - Nordic Expansion

short_description: Discover a new tale to tell as you set off to the northern reaches of the world! Build routes between colourful Nordic cities, claim the sprawling Murmansk-Lieksa route and earn the Globetrotter bonus in the world’s favourite train adventure game!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain
